Title: The Death of Stalin
Writer: Armando Iannucci, David Schneider, Ian Martin, Peter Fellows (additional material by), Fabien Nury (based on the comic book "The Death of Stalin" by), Thierry Robin (based on the comic book "The Death of Stalin" by), Fabien Nury (original screenplay by)
Actors: Olga Kurylenko, Tom Brooke, Paddy Considine, Justin Edwards
Plot: Moscow, 1953. After being in power for nearly thirty years, Soviet dictator Joseph Vissarionovich Stalin (Adrian McLoughlin) takes ill and quickly dies. Now the members of the Council of Ministers scramble for power.
Awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 18 wins & 36 nominations.
Production: Panache Productions, France 3 Cinéma, Quad Productions, Gaumont, Main Journey, La Compagnie Cinématographique
